title: UAE to Double Trade With India, Signs Long-Term LNG Contact
description: The United Arab Emirates will invest in developing a special investment hub in western India as well as double bilateral trade to $200 billion by 2032 as the two countries seek closer ties amid global geopolitical uncertainties.
content: The United Arab Emirates will invest in developing a special investment hub in western India as well as double bilateral trade to $200 billion by 2032 as the two countries seek closer ties amid global geopolitical uncertainties.
